overview: Alina Lopez and Abella Danger are excited to see their teacher, Jaclyn Taylor, for a faculty meeting regarding their upcoming high school prom. The two mischievous teens have a bet going to see who can have sex with the most teachers before prom. Kristen Scott has always wondered what goes on in the teacher's lounge. She can't help but have naughty fantasies about it, imagining what all her teachers do behind closed doors. Natasha Nice is an earnest teacher dealing with a difficult student. Ember Snow is known by all the teachers in school for being a hellion, and it seems as though Emberâ€™s set on making Natasha's life especially difficult.
title: Schooled!
